result.title: Training #1
result.content:
I prepared first training contest (check "Contests" tab).

It will be easy contest with about 6-10 really simple problems. The main idea is to train speed and correctness. There should be really few bombs and many accepts.

Check if you gonna have time for it — if not — write under this post.

Please check if you have any solved problems already and tell us about it asap!

Beside this, today (2014-08-24) is the Cook-off at CodeChef (more details can be found here). I recommend starting in this contest.
